TOAST.DESTRUCTIVE: I am an error notification. Please resolve something already.
TOAST.DONE: I am a success notification. Everything is fine, but don't mess up.
TOAST.WARNING: I am a warning notification. Just take note.
TOAST.UPDATE_TELEGRAM: This method is not supported in the current version of Telegram. Please update the app to the latest version.

CONFIRMATION_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: If we see that you have not met the task requirements (you must be subscribed to the channel for at least 5 days), we will deduct double the amount of coins.
